Headline: #75 74th-75thTemporary Westbound Reroute near 75th/South Shore
ShortDescription: Westbound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony Island, 76th, South Chicago and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony Island, 76th, South Chicago and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Shore.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Northbound Reroute near 75th/South Shore
ShortDescription: Northbound #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via South Chicago, 76th, Greenwood, 75th and South Chicago: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Shore

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #12 Roosevelt and #18 16th/18th Temporary Reroute near Roosevelt/Canal
ShortDescription: #12 Roosevelt and #18 16th/18th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to a bridge lift near Roosevelt/Canal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#12 Roosevelt and #18 16th/18th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via Roosevelt, Jefferson, Harrison, State, then resume their normal route on Roosevelt.
  • Westbound buses will operate via Roosevelt, State, Harrison, Clinton, then resume their normal route on Roosevelt.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to a bridge lift near Roosevelt/Canal.
